items.title: iOS Style Switches
items.description: Fully parametric and scalable style for HTML checkboxes which mimicks the appearance of iOS toggle switches. Created using vanilla CSS only.

items.title: CSS No-Select
items.description: Use a combination of user-select: none; and cursor: default; to prevent the browser from displaying the text select cursor or allowing the user to select/highlight text. Useful for interface items on web apps.

items.title: tvOS Style 3D Buttons
items.description: A JavaScript/CSS animation to mimick the behavior of the buttons on the Apple TV.
